properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 11 at 7:47PM CST by NWS Mobile AL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a flood warning for the
following rivers in Alabama...

Mobile River At Barry Steam Plant affecting Baldwin and Mobile Counties.

.Heavy rainfall is forecast to occur over the next 24 hours. As a result...river
levels are forecast to rise and a flood warning is now in effect. It is
emphasized that the following forecast is based on the expected rainfall during
the next 24 hours. If less rainfall occurs...it may be necessary to revise this
stage forecast downward.

The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a

* Flood Warning for
The Mobile River At Barry Steam Plant
* From Saturday evening until further notice
* At 7PM Tuesday the stage was...8.9 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast
* Flood stage is 12.0 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by Saturday before midnight and continue to
rise near 12.3 feet by Sunday early afternoon. Additional rises are possible
thereafter.
* At 12.0 feet...Considerable overflow of lowlands in the area. A few county
roads become flooded.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...
Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather radio.
